courseName: How to Trade Options: A Beginner's Guide
description: Many people think that trading options is too risky, but with the right strategy, it can actually be quite profitable. In this video, you'll learn how to trade options and build a successful options trading strategy. Watch the video now to start making money from options trading!
introduction:
1. Introduction to Options Derivative Trading
2. Introduction to Call Options
3. Introduction to Put Options
4. Options Derivative Trading- Seller of Options
5. Time Decay, Implied Volatility and Option Greeks
6.

courseName: Options Trading Strategies for the Stock Market Beginner
description: In this video, we'll cover some basic options trading strategies for beginners. You'll learn about calls and puts, as well as how to choose the right strike price and expiration date. We'll also talk about how to manage risk when trading options. By the end of this video, you'll be ready to start trading options like a pro!
introduction:
1. How to use Option Strategies: Bull and Bear Call Spread
2. BULL CALL SPREAD - BEAR CALL SPREAD - BULL PUT SPREAD- BEAR PUT SPREAD 
3. Option Strategies: Strangles and Straddles
4. OPTION STRATEGIES - STRADDLE AND STRANGLE
5. Option Strategies: Call Ratio Back Spread Strategy
6. To trade or not to trade: Options Trading Strategies - Butterfly Spread
7. OPTION STRATEGIES - PUT RATIO BACK SPREAD WITH BANK NIFTY - EXTENSION OF BACK SPREAD VIDEO - TAMIL

description: Investing in the stock market can be a great way to make money, but it can also be a bit daunting for beginners. This video will teach you the basics of how the stock market works, and give you some tips on how to get started. Watch now and learn how to make your money work for you!
introduction:
1.  Difference Between Saving and Investing | How to Create Wealth | Beginner Guide
2.  Financial Planning for Beginners | Benefits of Financial Planning
3.  Why Investing In Stock Market A Smart Move? | Learn Share Market | Importance of Investing
4.  Market Participants | Role of SEBI | Stock Market Eco System
5.  What is an IPO in Share Market | Initial public offering | Company Point of View | Part 01
6.  Learn IPO | Can you make a profit in IPO | margin required for IPO | How to apply for IPO | Part 02
7.  Fascinating Reasons Why Share Prices Go Up and Down Truth About Stock Prices Share Prices Move
